body_text: When will Fairy Tail (2014) be dubbed? I really love the Fairy Tail anime, but cannot seem to find more dubbed episodes in English after episode 175. Does any one know when FUNimation will continue dubbing the Fairy Tail anime?
When will Fairy Tail episode 176 be available as an English dub? When will Fairy Tail episode 176 be released in an English-dubbed format?
